solidbase.core
Class CommandProcessor

java.lang.Object
  solidbase.core.CommandProcessor
Direct Known Subclasses:
PatchProcessor, SQLProcessor
public abstract class CommandProcessor
extends Object

Processes commands, maintains state, triggers the listeners.

Since:
May 2010
Author:
René M. de Bloois

Pattern for SKIP.

skipEnd

protected static final Pattern skipEnd
Pattern for /SKIP.

listeners

protected List<CommandListener> listeners
A list of command listeners. A listener listens to the statements being executed and is able to intercept specific ones.

startMessage

protected String startMessage
The message that should be shown when a statement is executed.

sectionLevel

protected int sectionLevel
Current section nesting.

ignoreStack

protected Stack<String[]> ignoreStack
Errors that should be ignored. @{link #ignoreSet} is kept in sync with this stack.

ignoreSet

protected Set<String> ignoreSet
Errors that should be ignored. This set is kept in sync with the ignoreStack.

progress

protected ProgressListener progress
The progress listener.

currentDatabase

protected Database currentDatabase
The current database.

databases

protected Map<String,Database> databases
All configured databases. This is used when the upgrade file selects a different database by name.

noSkipCounter

protected int noSkipCounter
Together with skipCounter this enables nested conditions. As long as nested conditions evaluate to true the noSkipCounter gets incremented. After the first nested condition evaluates to false, the skipCounter get incremented.

skipCounter

protected int skipCounter
Together with noSkipCounter this enables nested conditions. As long as nested conditions evaluate to true the noSkipCounter gets incremented. After the first nested condition evaluates to false, the skipCounter get incremented.

executeListeners

protected boolean executeListeners(Command command)
                            throws SQLException
Give the listeners a chance to react to the given command.

Parameters:
command - The command to be executed.
Returns:
True if a listener has processed the command, false otherwise.
Throws:
SQLException - If the database throws an exception.

pushIgnores

protected void pushIgnores(String ignores)
Adds a comma separated list of SQLStates to be ignored. See SQLException.getSQLState().

Parameters:
ignores - A comma separated list of errors to be ignored.

popIgnores

protected void popIgnores()
Remove the last added list of ignores.

skip

protected void skip(boolean skip)
Skip persistent commands depending on the boolean parameter. If the skip parameter is true commands will be skipped, otherwise not. As skip(boolean) and endSkip() can be nested, the same number of endSkips need to be called as the number of skips to stop the skipping.

Parameters:
skip - If true, commands will be skipped, otherwise not.

endSkip

protected void endSkip()
Stop skipping commands. As skip(boolean) and endSkip() can be nested, only when the same number of endSkips are called as the number of skips, the skipping will stop.

section

protected void section(String level,
                       String message,
                       Command command)
Starts a new section. Calls startSection(int, String) to actually pass it on to the ProgressListener.

Parameters:
level - The level of the section.
message - The message to be shown.
command - The command that started this.

startSection

protected void startSection(int level,
                            String message)
Starts a new section. Called by section(String, String, Command).

Parameters:
level - The level of the section.
message - The message to be shown.

refreshIgnores

Synchronize the set of ignores with the queue's contents.
